text: 6: And a Spring Forever Gone
trans: 无法来临的春天

text: The crew learns from Osada and Garoza that Krelkulkil has also come to the estate, and rush to the confinement cell. The sight of the elder and a slain Corwell awaits them, with Krelkulkil nowhere to be seen. They leave the estate to chase after him.
trans: 众人从加罗萨和阿贞口中得知卡拉库拉奇尔已经来到这里，于是赶快前往牢房，他们看到了长老和已经被斩杀的克洛威尔，但卡拉库拉奇尔不知所踪，于是众人立刻出发去追赶他。

text: Krelkulkil is confronting his grandfather in the confinement cells.
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔在牢房与他的爷爷对峙。

text: Meanwhile in the garden, 姬塔 and company take out all of the monsters.
trans: 与此同时在花园处，姬塔众人将怪物悉数打倒。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Phew. Looks like we got rid of the whole group!
trans: 呼~终于把所有的怪物都打倒了！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: They all swarmed into the garden out of nowhere. I hope everyone in the house is all right.
trans: 它们突然之间就出现在花园里……希望宅邸里的其他人没有受伤。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Hey, big guy, you live here, right? Where was the elder's room again? We gotta let him know what happened.
trans: 呐，大叔，你是住在这个宅邸的人吧？长老爷爷的屋子在哪里呢？我们要赶快赶过去确认一下。

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: O-oh... Elder's room... Yeah, it's, um...
trans: 啊，啊啊~长老的房间呢……长老的……

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Enough of this farce. You two aren't residents of this estate, are you?
trans: 不用再装了，你们两个不是这个宅邸的人吧。

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Erk! How did you—
trans: 你……你怎么知道？

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: I knew it. There are a few Draphs that come and go, but the majority are Harvins.
trans: 果然，虽然在这里出入的多拉夫族不是没有，但是大部分都是哈文族。

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Now be good and fess up.
trans: 刚才是稍微诈你们一下。

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Oof...
trans: 哦，哦……

name: Osada/阿贞
text: The cat's out of the bag...
trans: 露馅了的话，就只能这样了……

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: If you don't live here, then don't tell me you're thieves!
trans: 那个，不是这个宅邸的人，这样的话，难道是小偷？

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: No! No, no! This is a misunderstanding!
trans: 不，不是啦，是误会啦！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: So why are you two out here in the middle of the night?
trans: 那，这么晚了在这里干什么啊？

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Well, you see—
trans: 那……那个……

name: Osada/阿贞
text: We came to help Bruv Krelkulkil!
trans: 我们是来帮助卡拉库拉奇尔小哥的！

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Krelkulkil!
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔……！？

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: He's here at the estate?
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔在这宅邸里吗！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Yes! He got wind that his nemesis was here somewhere.
trans: 是的！卡拉库拉奇尔小哥听说这里有他的仇人。

name: Osada/阿贞
text: We came to help make his revenge come true!
trans: 我们是来帮助他完成复仇的！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Sevilbarra!
trans: 啊，萨比尔巴拉先生！

text: Sevilbarra makes a break for the confinement cells while everyone else chases after him.
trans: 众人追赶着奔向牢房的萨比尔巴拉离开。

name: Elder/老人
text: Is that you, Sevilbarra?
trans: 是你吗，萨比尔巴拉？

text: The Harvin samurai stares in shock at the fallen bodies in the cell.
trans: 萨比尔巴拉瞪大了眼睛看着牢房里的尸体。

name: Elder/老人
text: If you're looking for Krelkulkil, he's gone. And he took your family's demon blade with him.
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔已经离开了，你家传的妖刀，也被他带走了。

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Our demon blade?
trans: 妖刀……？

text: It takes a second for the elder's words to register. Sevilbarra realizes that Corwell no longer wields a weapon.
trans: 长老解释了一番，萨比尔巴拉才发现克洛威尔一直紧握的妖刀没有了。

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Why's it always like this!
trans: 怎么会这样！

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: How do I keep letting this happen before my very eyes! And now he has two blades!
trans: 为什么我又一次让这种事情发生了！而且这一次让他拿到了两振妖刀！

name: Elder/老人
text: One katana, two katanas—what does it matter? That boy is too far gone, Sevilbarra.
trans: 一振，两振……都没有区别，那个孩子已经不能长久了，萨比尔巴拉。

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: I won't have it!
trans: 就算这样……！

text: 姬塔 prevents Sevilbarra from getting physical with the senior.
trans: 姬塔阻止了想要抓住长老的萨比尔巴拉。

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: 姬塔...
trans: 姬塔……

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Yeah, I hear what you're saying.
trans: 啊，是啊，你说的没错。

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: What's done is done. A war of words won't change anything. Krelkulkil must be captured!
trans: 事到如今，在这里争吵也没有意义，必须赶快抓住卡拉库拉奇尔！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: I don't think he could've gotten very far! Let's hurry!
trans: 他应该还没有走远，快走吧！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Wait for us!
trans: 我们也要一起去！

text: The party, with two newcomers in tow, rush into the night to look for Krelkulkil.
trans: 众人为了寻找卡拉库拉奇尔，奔入夜色之中。
scene_evt181130_cp6_q3_s10
